passages.content:
From: Jessica Huang
To: Customer Support
Subject: Order Inquiry

Hello,

I placed an order (Order #4821) on March 5th for 20 ergonomic chairs and 10 standing desks. I was quoted a delivery window of 7-10 business days, so I expected delivery by March 19th.

I have not received any shipping notification. Could you please provide an update?

Thank you,
Jessica Huang, Procurement Manager

From: Customer Support
To: Jessica Huang
Subject: RE: Order Inquiry

Dear Ms. Huang,

Thank you for reaching out regarding Order #4821. I apologize for the lack of communication.

Your order is at our warehouse awaiting shipment. Due to unexpectedly high order volumes, there has been a slight delay. Your items should arrive by March 21st, two days later than estimated.

As compensation, we would like to offer you a $50 store credit for your next purchase.

Best regards,
Mark Ellis, Customer Support

options.B: An update on her order status
options.C: A change to her delivery address

questions.explanation: Ms. Huang asks to 'provide an update on the status of my order.'

questions.stem: Why has the order been delayed?
questions.explanation: The delay is 'due to unexpectedly high order volumes.'

questions.stem: When is Ms. Huang's order now expected to arrive?
questions.explanation: Ms. Huang expected March 19th; the new date is March 21st.

questions.stem: What can be inferred about Ms. Huang's situation?

options.A: She plans to cancel her order.
options.B: She may need the furniture by a specific deadline.
options.C: She has ordered from this store many times.

questions.explanation: As a Procurement Manager ordering office furniture, she likely has a deadline.

questions.stem: What does Officeplus Store offer as compensation?

options.C: A $50 store credit for a future purchase
options.D: A full refund of the shipping fee

questions.explanation: 'A $50 store credit for your next purchase.'
